DATA_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the data directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/investment-analytics/data
FINANCIAL_CONTENT_API_URL: Financial content URL goes here; i.e http://markets.financialcontent.com/stocks
IEX_API_KEY: Prod IEX Cloud public API token goes here; e.g. pk_blahblahblah
IEX_API_URL: Prod URL goes here; i.e. https://cloud.iexapis.com/stable
LOG_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the log directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/iex-investment-analytics/logs
PROJECT_DIRECTORY: Absolute path to the project directory goes here; e.g. /Users/user/iex-investment-analytics
SANDBOX_IEX_API_KEY: Sandbox IEX Cloud public API token goes here; e.g. Tpk_blahblahblah
SANDBOX_IEX_API_URL: Sandbox URL goes here; i.e. https://sandbox.iexapis.com/stable
